sourceMeaningMnemonic: In <radical>Asia</radical> they assume everyone's <radical>heart</radical> is automatically <kanji>bad</kanji> and <kanji>evil</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You don't want a bunch of evil in your heart, do you? No, I didn't think so.
readingMnemonic: Luckily, people in Asia know how to get the <kanji>evil</kanji> <kanji>bad</kanji>ness out of your heart with <reading>acu</reading>puncture (<ja>あく</ja>).
readingInfo: Acupuncture was originally invented in Asia a long, long time ago, to stop the bad chi from going through your heart.
